modName: Main Menu Music Replacement_The Bard Song cover by Malukah
summary: Replaces the music on the main menu with a soothing cover of the Bard Song.
descriptionHtml:
It replaces the music on the main menu, and it can also be played in a tavern. If you haven\'t heard the song, here\'s the link: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g

Be aware that I DID NOT make the song. I just did the modding.

-Installation-
Drag and drop the Music folder into your Data folder.
author: Fuzion

files.name: The Bard Song cover by Malukah
